overview: Writer-director Gerardo Chijona (Adorable Lies) presents another story of love and ambition in modern Cuba. In this one, Sissy (Thais Vald√©z) aspires to be a dancer at Havana's world-famous Tropicana club, but her truck-driving father disapproves. When the truck driver accidentally hits a young man (Vladimir Cruz), he brings him home to recuperate. Naturally, Sissy and the young man fall in love -- but they don't know who he really is.
title: A Paradise Under the Stars
